io.confluent.ksql.rest.server

Interface Executable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConnectExecutable, KsqlRestApplication, MultiExecutable, StandaloneExecutor

    public interface Executable
    An Executable is a lifecycle interface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void awaitTerminated()
      Awaits the notifyTerminated() notification.
      default void notifyTerminated()
      Called to notify threads awaiting termination (see #awaitTerminated) that it's time to shutdown.
      default void shutdown()
      Shutdown the service.
      default void startAsync()
      Starts the executable asynchronously.

    • Method Detail

      • startAsync

        default void startAsync()
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Starts the executable asynchronously. Guaranteed to be called before shutdown.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • notifyTerminated

        default void notifyTerminated()
        Called to notify threads awaiting termination (see #awaitTerminated) that it's time to shutdown.

      • shutdown

        default void shutdown()
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Shutdown the service.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • awaitTerminated

        default void awaitTerminated()
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Awaits the notifyTerminated() notification. This is a blocking operation. Guaranteed to be called before shutdown.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
